text: Donald Harry Stone (born 9 January 1927) is an English former cricketer active from 1949 to 1951 who played for Lancashire. He was born in Manchester. He appeared in six first-class matches as a lefthanded batsman who bowled right arm fast medium pace. He scored 86 runs with a highest score of 46 and held one catch. He took nine wickets with a best analysis of four for 30.Donald Stone at CricketArchive ==Notes== Category:1927 births Category:English cricketers Category:Lancashire cricketers Category:Living people
title: Donald Stone (cricketer)
